description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6kf1c","text":"This protocol describes our free-floating  multiplexed immunofluorescent staining protocol to ascertain levels of tau and phospho- tau in mouse tissue from transplanted human iPSC cells carrying different PD related mutations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"efjsr","text":"IMPORTANT: perform all antibody incubation steps and steps following in minimal light so as not to bleach signals prior to imaging","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5ts2k","text":"Briefly, the mouse brain tissue sections are prepared by washing off the cryoprotectant medium and then antigen retrieval is performed followed by quenching, blocking and primary antibody incubation. Sections are then washed and incubated in the appropriate secondary antibody solution and are then mounted, cover-slipped and sealed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9kqva","text":"30 μm mouse brain sections were stored in anti-freeze solution at    until required. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":66,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3j2i0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9umkb","text":"Pour sections into a well insert in a 6-well plate to separate storage solution from section","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6g1l","text":" Move the well insert to another well containing approximately   of 1x PBS. {"blocks":[{"key":"8toj9","text":"Label slides with corresponding section and antibody information","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2896g","text":"Place sections in a petri dish with 1xPBS and nudge the sections onto slides with brush","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6jhu9","text":"Mount with anti-fade media (DAKO Fluorescence Mounting Medium, Agilent, cat# S302380-2)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5lkjr","text":"Wait for sections to become dry and seal with sealant (Biotium CoverGripTM Coverslip Sealant, cat#23005)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3k59o","text":"Store in slide box and store in fridge/cool room  ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":49,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2tend","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
